mapper.update:
update TRDCM_FLW
BRST_ECD = #{brstEcd},
TNT_NO = #{tntNo},
ORD_NO = #{ordNo},
BZODR_NO = #{bzodrNo},
SRVBL_NO = #{srvblNo},
MODUL_ECD = #{modulEcd},
SERNO = #{serno},
DPST_SERV_INSDOUTSD_CD = #{dpstServInsdoutsdCd},
TRGT_SERV_CENT_INTFC_NM = #{trgtServCentIntfcNm},
TRGT_SERV_CENT_RSPSCD = #{trgtServCentRspscd},
TRGT_SERV_CENT_RSPND_INFO = #{trgtServCentRspndInfo},
REQE_MSG_INFO = #{reqeMsgInfo},
RETN_MSG_INFO = #{retnMsgInfo},
SYS_DLWTH_STUCD = #{sysDlwthStucd},
REPTR_TB_APLTN = #{reptrTbApltn},
VAL_DTINF = #{valDtinf},
RCPTN_DT = #{rcptnDt},
RCPTN_TM = #{rcptnTm},
REMRK = #{remrk},
TRD_DT = #{trdDt},
TRD_TM = #{trdTm},
VLD_FLG = #{vldFlg},
FAL_REAS = #{falReas},
CRT_TM 2= #{crtTm},
UPD_TM = #{updTm},
NODE_ID = #{nodeId},
CPNST_TX_STUS_CD = #{cpnstTxStusCd},
EXTN_FLOWT_ID = #{extnFlowtId}
WHERE PK_ID=#{pkId} and BRST_ECD = #{brstEcd}
mapper.select:
SELECT PK_ID ,BRST_ECD ,TNT_NO ,ORD_NO ,BZODR_NO ,SRVBL_NO ,MODUL_ECD ,SERNO ,DPST_SERV_INSDOUTSD_CD ,TRGT_SERV_CENT_INTFC_NM ,TRGT_SERV_CENT_RSPSCD ,TRGT_SERV_CENT_RSPND_INFO ,REQE_MSG_INFO ,RETN_MSG_INFO ,SYS_DLWTH_STUCD ,REPTR_TB_APLTN ,VAL_DTINF ,RCPTN_DT ,RCPTN_TM ,REMRK ,TRD_DT ,TRD_TM ,VLD_FLG ,FAL_REAS ,CRT_TM ,UPD_TM ,NODE_ID ,CPNST_TX_STUS_CD ,EXTN_FLOWT_ID FROM TRDCM_FLW WHERE BRST_ECD = #{brstEcd} and ORD_NO=#{ordNo} and MODUL_ECD=#{modulEcd} and SERNO=#{serno}
and BZODR_NO=#{bzodrNo}

SELECT PK_ID , BRST_ECD , TNT_NO , ORD_NO , BZODR_NO , SRVBL_NO , MODUL_ECD , SERNO , DPST_SERV_INSDOUTSD_CD , TRGT_SERV_CENT_INTFC_NM , TRGT_SERV_CENT_RSPSCD , TRGT_SERV_CENT_RSPND_INFO , REQE_MSG_INFO , RETN_MSG_INFO , SYS_DLWTH_STUCD , REPTR_TB_APLTN , VAL_DTINF , RCPTN_DT , RCPTN_TM , REMRK , TRD_DT , TRD_TM , VLD_FLG , FAL_REAS , CRT_TM , UPD_TM , NODE_ID , CPNST_TX_STUS_CD , EXTN_FLOWT_ID FROM TRDCM_FLW WHERE ORD_NO = #{ordNo} and BZODR_NO = #{bzodrNo} and BRST_ECD = #{brstEcd} and EXTN_FLOWT_ID = #{extnFlowtId} order by CRT_TM

SELECT PK_ID ,BRST_ECD ,TNT_NO ,ORD_NO ,BZODR_NO ,SRVBL_NO ,MODUL_ECD ,SERNO ,DPST_SERV_INSDOUTSD_CD ,TRGT_SERV_CENT_INTFC_NM ,TRGT_SERV_CENT_RSPSCD ,TRGT_SERV_CENT_RSPND_INFO ,REQE_MSG_INFO ,RETN_MSG_INFO ,SYS_DLWTH_STUCD ,REPTR_TB_APLTN ,VAL_DTINF ,RCPTN_DT ,RCPTN_TM ,REMRK ,TRD_DT ,TRD_TM ,VLD_FLG ,FAL_REAS ,CRT_TM ,UPD_TM ,NODE_ID ,CPNST_TX_STUS_CD ,EXTN_FLOWT_ID FROM TRDCM_FLW WHERE ORD_NO=#{ordNo} and BZODR_NO=#{bzodrNo} and MODUL_ECD=#{modulEcd} and SERNO=#{serno} and SRVBL_NO=#{srvblNo} and BRST_ECD=#{brstEcd}
mapper.update:
update TRDCM_FLW
NODE_ID = #{nodeId},
SYS_DLWTH_STUCD = #{sysDlwthStucd},
CPNST_TX_STUS_CD = #{cpnstTxStusCd},
WHERE BRST_ECD = #{brstEcd} and ORD_NO=#{ordNo} and BZODR_NO=#{bzodrNo} and SRVBL_NO=#{srvblNo} and MODUL_ECD=#{modulEcd} and SERNO=#{serno}

update TRDCM_FLW
NODE_ID = #{nodeId},
SYS_DLWTH_STUCD = #{sysDlwthStucd},
CPNST_TX_STUS_CD = #{cpnstTxStusCd},
WHERE BRST_ECD = #{brstEcd} and ORD_NO=#{ordNo} and BZODR_NO=#{bzodrNo} and SRVBL_NO=#{srvblNo}
